verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: is] using some goosey numbers to rationalize his aggressive rhetoric on trade .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is [V: using] [ARG1: some goosey numbers] [ARG2: to rationalize his aggressive rhetoric on trade] .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is using some goosey numbers to [V: rationalize] [ARG1: his aggressive rhetoric on trade] .
